
mail_gateway
============

.. py:module:: mail_gateway


Overview
--------


.. list-table:: Function
   :header-rows: 0
   :widths: auto
   :class: summarytable

   * - :py:obj:`send_email <mail_gateway.send_email>`\ (emailToSend, nameOfFile)
     - Send email to the user with the link to download the video




Functions
---------
.. py:function:: send_email(emailToSend, nameOfFile)

   Send email to the user with the link to download the video

   :param emailToSend: the email to send the video to
   :param nameOfFile: the name of the video file to send
